item.description:
HITS is a series of weekly coached indoor clinics run by Waltham Volleyball Club, Bob Boudreau.
The clinics are aimed at advanced and intermediate men, although women are welcome.
Although the program is not for beginners, the coaches teach technique, and the drills are a great work-out.

The sign-up here is just for informational purposes.
To participate, you simply need to show up at the 8/26 6:30 tryouts at WHS.

For more info see:
http://hitsvolleyball...
item.how_to_find_us: You must enter from Lexington St. and stay right. The Gym is at the far end of the school. GPS: 42.394307,-71.229452
item.name: HITS Indoor Volleyball Clinics
